name: Potluck
description:
"One autumn day, Potluck the witch held a big veggie potluck with all her witch friends. They decided to go off and play volleyball before the meal. But as they were leaving, the Demon King came upon their feast...and stole it!

When the witches got back, they discovered that their food was gone. Potluck had to teach that Demon King a lesson!"

Art & sfx by sheep-herder

Music & code by rio8

Original release: November 2013, for Game Jolt Contest 10

Note: this version features nicer controls and a lower difficulty than the original

Get the OST here
